description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Hell has taken over earth. Now you are taking the fight to them as you run through the ruined city and take down the spawns of hell. But watch out it's dangerous in the streets and the demons are not the only thing to worry about.
description.short: Hell has taken over earth. Now you are taking the fight to them as you run through the ruined city and take down the spawns of hell. But watch out it's dangerous in the streets and the demons are not the only thing to worry about.
